value.title: Safeguard your environment with Azure Advanced Threat Protection
value.excerpt: Learn about the Azure Advanced Threat Protection component of Microsoft Threat Protection.

value.title: Manage repository changes by using pull requests on GitHub
value.excerpt: Learn how to manage changes to your repository source by using pull requests.

value.title: Manage an InnerSource program by using GitHub
value.excerpt: Learn to manage a successful InnerSource program on GitHub through effective discoverability, guidance, and maintenance.

value.title: Learn how to manage IoT devices as an IT admin
value.excerpt: This module is an introduction to the Internet of Things for IT admins.

value.title: Monitor data drift with Azure Machine Learning
value.excerpt: Changing trends in data over time can reduce the accuracy of the predictions made by a model. Monitoring for this data drift is an important way to ensure your model continues to predict accurately.

value.title: Monitor models with Azure Machine Learning
value.excerpt: After a machine learning model has been deployed into production, it's important to understand how it is being used by capturing and viewing telemetry.

value.title: Planning for implementing SAP solutions on Azure
value.excerpt: Planning for implementing SAP solutions on Azure

value.title: Protect data in-transit and at rest
value.excerpt: Protect data in-transit and at rest

value.title: Publish and manage your APIs with Azure API Management
value.excerpt: Learn about using an Azure API gateway to share APIs with partners, and how to use subscription keys to control access to your APIs.

value.title: Query data in Azure Synapse Analytics
value.excerpt: Learn how to issue simple queries against Azure Synapse Analytics and how to visualize the data in both Excel and Power BI

value.title: React to state changes in your Azure services by using Event Grid
value.excerpt: Build a serverless application architecture, automate your operations, and integrate applications by handling Azure events with Event Grid.

value.title: Read text with the Computer Vision service
value.excerpt: Optical character recognition (OCR) enables artificial intelligence (AI) systems to read text in images, enabling applications to extract information from photographs, scanned documents, and other sources of digitized text.

value.title: Deploy real-time machine learning services with Azure Machine Learning
value.excerpt: Learn how to register and deploy ML models as real-rim services with the Azure Machine Learning service.

value.title: Run functional tests in Azure Pipelines
value.excerpt: Run Selenium UI tests, a form of functional testing, in Azure Pipelines.

value.title: Run a background task in an App Service Web App with WebJobs
value.excerpt: In this module, we'll guide you through creating a WebJob in the same project as an existing Web App and automating tasks with WebJobs.

value.title: Search and organize repository history by using GitHub
value.excerpt: Learn to search and organize repository history by using filters, blame, and cross-linking on GitHub.

value.title: Approach your data-flow diagram with the right threat model focus
value.excerpt: Threat modeling is an effective technique to help you identify threats and ways to reduce or eliminate risk. We start by deciding to focus on either what needs to be protected or who it needs protection from.

value.title: Prioritize your issues and apply security controls
value.excerpt: Threat modeling provides you with a list of threats and ways to reduce or eliminate risk, but it doesn't prioritize them for you. Also, there are no layered security control recommendations based on their type and function.

value.title: Provide context with the right depth layer
value.excerpt: Threat models can get complex if all parties involved cannot agree on a data-flow diagram depth layer that provides enough context to satisfy requirements

value.title: Translate text and speech
value.excerpt: Automated translation capabilities in an AI solution enables closer collaboration by removing language barriers.

value.title: Upload your project by using GitHub best practices
value.excerpt: Learn to upload your existing project to GitHub.

value.title: Work with Compute in Azure Machine Learning
value.excerpt: Learn how to manage compute contexts for experiments in Azure Machine Learning.

value.title: Work with DataFrames in Azure Databricks
value.excerpt: Work with DataFrames in Azure Databricks

value.title: Work with mutable and partial data in Azure Cache for Redis
value.excerpt: Learn how to create transactions, manage memory, and use the cache-aside pattern with Azure Cache for Redis

value.title: Automate tasks in SQL Server
value.excerpt: Scripting repetitive tasks in Azure SQL for regular maintenance jobs and multi-instance administration. Automation of error and resource alerts. Configuration of notifications for failures.

topItems.title: Configure automatic deployment for Azure SQL Database
topItems.excerpt: Utilize Azure Resource Manager templates for deploying Azure SQL resources.

topItems.title: Schedule tasks using SQL Server Agent
topItems.excerpt: Explore SQL automation for scheduled tasks and automatic alerts for SQL Server and Managed Instance. Configure extended event sessions for tracing activities.

topItems.title: Manage Azure PaaS resources using automated methods
topItems.excerpt: Explore SQL automation for Azure SQL Database and Open Source databases. Configure elastic jobs and Azure Policy.

value.title: Automate your deployments with Azure DevOps learning path
value.excerpt: Learn how to combine automation techniques such as infrastructure as code with automated pipelines to provision and configure the infrastructure you need to run your applications and services.

topItems.title: Provision infrastructure in Azure Pipelines
topItems.excerpt: Learn how infrastructure as code enables you to describe and automatically provision the infrastructure that you need for your application.

topItems.title: Configure infrastructure in Azure Pipelines
topItems.excerpt: Run configuration management tools in Azure Pipelines to help keep your infrastructure configured as you need.

value.title: Automate your deployments with Azure DevOps
value.excerpt: Learn how to combine automation techniques such as infrastructure as code with automated pipelines to provision and configure the infrastructure you need to run your applications and services.

topItems.title: Provision infrastructure in Azure Pipelines
topItems.excerpt: Learn how infrastructure as code enables you to describe and automatically provision the infrastructure that you need for your application.

topItems.title: Configure infrastructure in Azure Pipelines
topItems.excerpt: Run configuration management tools in Azure Pipelines to help keep your infrastructure configured as you need.

value.title: Azure Fundamentals part 4: Describe general security and network security features
value.excerpt: Learn about the various Azure services you can use to help ensure that your cloud resources are safe, secure, and trusted.

topItems.title: Introduction to Azure Fundamentals
topItems.excerpt: This module introduces you to the basics of Azure.

topItems.title: Protect against security threats on Azure
topItems.excerpt: Learn how Azure can help you protect the workloads you run both in the cloud and in your on-premises datacenter.

topItems.title: Secure network connectivity on Azure
topItems.excerpt: Learn about the various Azure services you can use to help ensure that your network is safe, secure, and trusted.

value.title: Azure Fundamentals part 6: Describe Azure cost management and service level agreements
value.excerpt: Learn about the factors that influence cost, tools you can use to help estimate and manage your cloud spend, and how Azure's service-level agreements (SLAs) can impact your application design decisions.

topItems.title: Introduction to Azure Fundamentals
topItems.excerpt: This module introduces you to the basics of Azure.

topItems.title: Plan and manage your Azure costs
topItems.excerpt: Migration to the cloud presents new ways to think about your IT expenses. This module teaches you about the factors that influence cost and tools you can use to help estimate and manage your cloud spend.

topItems.title: Choose the right Azure services by examining SLAs and service lifecycle
topItems.excerpt: Learn about Azure's service-level agreements (SLAs) and how they can impact your application design decisions. Also see how to access preview services and learn how they impact your planning.

value.title: Cloud administration basics
value.excerpt:
Learn about the basics of the cloud, including the history, building blocks, and types of services, in preparation for real-world cloud practice on Azure.
In this learning path, you will:

Learn about the history of the cloud, and how it was built
Know the major cloud providers and cloud types
Understand what types of resources are available through the cloud
Recognize cloud service modules
Know the economic benefits of the cloud
Understand digital identity, and how digital identities can be shared and secured

In partnership with Dr. Majd Sakr and Carnegie Mellon University.

topItems.title: Foundations of cloud computing for administrators
topItems.excerpt: Cloud Admin course from Dr. Majd Sakr at Carnegie Mellon University. Learn about the cloud, including the history, building blocks, and types on your way to becoming a Cloud Administrator.

topItems.title: Provision and manage cloud services
topItems.excerpt: Cloud Admin course from Dr. Majd Sakr at Carnegie Mellon University. Learn about the different types of resources available on the cloud and the technology behind how they work.

topItems.title: Secure your cloud resources with access control
topItems.excerpt: Cloud Admin course from Dr. Majd Sakr at Carnegie Mellon University. Learn about digital identities and how they can be managed and synchronized within an organization.
